name: Corojo Perfecta
additionalNotes:
The Crossfire Corojo features a beautiful natural color highlighted with delicate, yet notable veins. The binder is native to the Dominican Republic and prized for their complex aromas, excellent burn and elegant white ash. The special blends of aged premium long leaf Dominican tobaccos creating a delicate balance of intensity, spice and creaminess! This medium bodied cigar has outstanding notes of cedar and chocolate, with moments of earth and spice.
